Html:
Hi. I have dun the step "Updating the Store Index to query the database" from Part 4 of the tutorial. I run the application but in section Store is no Genres list shown. I'm getting "Select from 0 genres:".

I have open the MusicStore.sdf file, but the table Genres is empty.

I am having the same problem, however, mine is a result of having connected to a remote SQL DB that was created from the script supplied. I have no problem when I connect to the local DB file. Any one have a solution or suggestion?
